Get Started
Fed Up of Waiting\nIn Queues? We have a solution for You
100% Contactless solution If shopping in the store, scan the product\'s barcode and add them to basket If shopping as takeaway, order from home and collect from the store at your convenience, or we will home deliver to you By using NoQ you don\'t have to queue up for the bill payment or getting your products

In this time, we stand together with you. For Covid-19 updates please visit the following link : https://www.mohfw.gov.in/ Stay safe with your family by taking necessary precautions. We understand the gravity of the situation and your need to buy groceries, with NoQ you can experience a contactless In-store shopping option or can order at home and take away from the store at your convenience. 100% contact free solution COVID-19\nRESPONSE

Choose a Petrol Pump Change City Android Studio android.studio@android.com My Profile Last Five Transactions About Us Terms and Conditions Contact Us Privacy Policy Refund Policy Logout Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Settings Navigation header
About Us We at RadiateLabs are on a mission to eliminate queues from the Retail Shops, because we understand that queuing up for kiosks is the most obsolete way of paying for items that you need.\nThrough our new app – NoQ, we enable customers to use their Smartphones to pay for items so that they can spend more time consuming, and less time buying.
Contact Us Email : \nnoq@radiatelabs.com\nCompany Website : \nhttps://www.radiatelabs.com\nProduct Website : \nhttps://www.younoq.com\nPhone : \n+91 9158911702\nOur Phone Lines are Open 9 AM to 5 PM Everyday\nWe keep checking our email 24/7
Refund Policy Our focus is complete customer satisfaction. In the event, if you are displeased with a product bought, the refund and return policy of the retailer from where you made the purchase would be used. Refund Policy The invoice sent to the phone number by message would be used as a bill for any refund request.\nPlease take the invoice message to the retailer and discuss with them any returns and refunds.\nThe User is responsible for understanding the Return & Refund policy of the retailer before making any purchase, as RadiateLabs would not be responsible for any damages.\nThe return would be made to the suitable payment form as deemed by the retailer, RadiateLabs will not be involved in any discussion related to any return and refund request. TestPolicy
